resources.string: Eden Gardens is the one of the most popular cricket grounds in world. It is really amazing to be there during any driver match or and festival. Its really enjoyable place.."
"It is extremely popular among the locals and has a good crowd. Pretty much away from the city. Its a big temple and lots of foreigners are also seen here."
"Victoria Memorial or Victoria Memorial Hall was built to commemorate the peak of the British Empire in India"
"The Missionaries of Charity's Mother House is a holy place of pilgrimage and reverence for those who are searching for a more meaningful existence."
"Howrah Bridge also known as Rabindra Setu is a suspension type balanced cantilever bridge located in West Bengal, India. It connects Howrah and Kolkata."
"Park Street is a famous thoroughfare in the city of Kolkata (formerly Calcutta), India. The street runs through what was a deer park of Sir Elijah Impey"
South Park Street Cemetery is located on Mother Teresa Sarani, Kolkata, India. The road used to be called Park Street, and prior to that Burial Ground Road.
"Eco Tourism Park surrounds a picturesque water body that measures 104 acres in surface area. It has an island in the middle, which can be reached by a bridge"
"Science City, Kolkata is the largest science centre in the Indian subcontinent under National Council of Science Museums (NCSM)"
"Birla Temple Kolkata is a popular sightseeing spot of the city. The temple is dedicated to the consortium of Lord Krishna and his beloved Radha."
"Barbecue nation and its sea food is extremely delicious. Its very crowded most often. Good dining on budget. Large variants of sea food are served here."
"This hotel has Great Ambience.. Amazing hospitality by the staff. Best thai restaurant in Kolkata.. Overall great experience."
"Excellent food, great spread for vegetarians too, impressive hospitality. Must visit if you are interested in sampling local cuisine."
"Great place for Unlimited Kebabs, Wholesome food.... famous for its unlimited kebab buffet platter"
"From Smoked Hilsa to Dub Sandesh, every single dish is just awesome , Chitagong Masala murgi , Borisaler Chingri Polao.. every dish was just mouthwatering."
"It's been long time they are serving delicious biryani..if u been to Kolkata you should just arsanal for yummy biryani and firni as there speciality"
"This is the best place to taste kebabs. They offers very good kebabs. Prices are reasonable. Week days are less crowded as compared to weekends."
"The food here is exotic and the ambience superb. The service is also remarkable. This restaurant is an ideal place to go with family and friends."
"This is a real royal treat for your senses. Be treated like the ancient Indian royals. Food is good and service is even better."
"A complete and well laid out Bengali fine dining experience. Though prices on a bit higher side but the service and ambiance is very nice."
"Excellent stay and dinning, very near to Dum Dum Airport. Besides EM bypass. Well connected with the City. Attached to Salt Lake City of Kolkata"
"Nice hotel with amazing hospitality by the staff. Thai food was very tasty ....Swimming pool timings can be extended upto 10 pm instead of 7 pm"
"Excellent place to stay both for business and pleasure The reception is manned by extremely polite receptionists who go the extra mile to make the stay comfortable"
"This is by far the best hotel Kolkata has to offer whether it be a business or a personal trip. Staff here is the best example of the philosophy of Indian hospitality"
"Cleanness is the best part of this hotel. food is very delicious and service staff is very attentive."
"Novotel Kolkata is a fantastic hotel to stay. Amidst the newer area of Kolkata, it is huge with very good rooms and ambience."

"This hotel is placed in nice location, particularly very suitable for people visiting IT offices in Kolkata. Comfortable stay, courteous and friendly staff. Well maintained rooms and excellent service"
"Home away from home. The rooms are quite spacious. Staff very helpful. Tasty food. Overall ambience very good. All in all a very good hotel."
"Located in the business centre of salt lake, kolkata and value for money luxury business hotel. Very good option or overnighter or long stay for business purpose. "

"Kolkata. The city enjoys winter from November to February. The low temperature during this season ranges between 9 and 11 degrees Celsius. It is the best time to visit Kolkata as the weather is cool and pleasant too. "
